text: Psilothrips is a genus of thrips in the family Thripidae. There are at least two described species in Psilothrips. ==Species== These two species belong to the genus Psilothrips. * Psilothrips pardalotus Hood, 1927 * Psilothrips priesneri (Moulton, 1926) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * ==External links== * Category:Thripidae
title: Psilothrips
